Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

InterleaveSet.description: This an interleave set for a memory chunk.
InterleaveSet.longDescription: This type shall describe an interleave set of which the memory chunk is a part.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Memory.description: Describes a memory device of the interleave set.
Memory.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the memory device to which these settings apply.

MemoryLevel.description: Level of the interleave set for multi-level tiered memory.
MemoryLevel.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the level of this interleave set for multi-level tiered memory.

OffsetMiB.description: Offset within the DIMM that corresponds to the start of this memory region, measured in mebibytes (MiB).
OffsetMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the offset within the DIMM that corresponds to the start of this memory region, with units in MiB.

RegionId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DIMM region identifier.

SizeMiB.description: Size of this memory region measured in mebibytes (MiB).
SizeMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the size of this memory region, with units in MiB.

MemoryChunks.description: This is the schema definition of a Memory Chunk and its configuration.
MemoryChunks.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent Memory Chunks and Interleave Sets in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AddressRangeType.description: Memory type of this memory chunk.
AddressRangeType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the type of memory chunk.

InterleaveSets.description: This is the interleave sets for the memory chunk.
InterleaveSets.longDescription: These properties shall represent the interleave sets for the memory chunk.

IsMirrorEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if memory mirroring is enabled for this MemoryChunk.

IsSpare.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if sparing is enabled for this MemoryChunk.

MemoryChunkSizeMiB.description: Size of the memory chunk measured in mebibytes (MiB).
MemoryChunkSizeMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the size of the memory chunk in MiB.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #MemoryChunks.v1_1_2.MemoryChunks
